price: 32 Voyant les croyants, ils disaient : « Ces gens-là sont vraiment égarés ! »
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
